name: Drive//Shaft
description: Drive//Shaft is an open-world, physics-based, multiplayer car racing game. Your mission is to be the first player to reach the mysterious glowing orb. First to ten wins. This is a great game if you have time to kill and want something silly and fun to play.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: An integrated graphics card Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: You can run the game on "Very Low" graphical settings with these specs. Lower your resolution if things are still choppy.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: A real graphics card Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: It's going to get pretty.
